full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'OD DPAG MED KYI SGRUB THABS SHIN TU BSDUS PA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES 'OD DPAG MED KYI SGRUB THABS SHIN TU BSDUS PA 'DI NI DAD SHES DANG LDAN PA'I THU NU MAL DAR KHAN DGE SLONG GI 'DOD PA LTAR, DZA YA PAndI TAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SKAD GNYIS SMRA BA SOGS CHOS LA BLO MIG RGYAS PA DGE TSUL BLO BZANG DON GRUB AER TE NI GU SHR'I'O,, ,,)
